summary: WHILE DRIVING THE BRAKE LINE DEVELOPED A HOLE WHICH CAUSED THE VEHICLE TO EXPERIENCE EXTENDED STOPPING DISTANCE.   *NLM   THE DRIVER APPLIED THE BRAKE AS HE WAS GOING OFF RAMP AND THE PEDAL HAD GONE TO THE FLOOR.  THE CONSUMER NOTICED A HOLE HAD BLOWN THROUGH THE METAL FLEX LINE.   *SCC   *JB
